comments_since_last_sample.body: Honestly it's your choice to choose what's in style or not
I can’t agree on the bomber one. They just hit that sweet spot between casual/clean/simple/stylish
Definitely have to disagree with the Chelsea boots
I thought all joggers were skin tight
Bomber jackets are not in style; they are in fashion. There is an important difference. Fashion comes and goes, but style remains style and can last a lifetime.
Every trend that he recommended in the past few years, and now he's redacting them all 🤦🏻‍♂️
I love how he insist first every one to try one and later on next video boom it's out of fashion z😂
hey jose just my 15 years of life i,ve hardly seen 5 or 6 people wearing Chelsea boots sooo i still think they are in the game
I have a tip for everyone. How about you wear whatever makes you feel and look good. Not everything works for everyone . Wear what you think looks good on you

Lmao what??? Bombers are back strongly just with a different way to style them 😅 If you are into fashion you’d realize that pieces don’t really change most of the time. It’s the style and aesthetic that does.

His hoodie is not out of style though lol
There is not such thing as chelsea boots or turtleneck out of style ever

Jose: Bombers are out of style..

I can't do anything about 1 to 5... Am sorry, I love these items, they make me look good, they fit perfectly with my body type and I feel confident whenever am in them. I can experiment with the new stuff... but I can't replace
